fields.descriptive_line: Industrial design drawing for the manafacture of the BT Synergy telephone wall bracket by Random Product Design Ltd, 1997.
fields.physical_description: Industrial design drawing for the manafacturer of the BT Synergy telephone wall bracket. Folded A0 CAD print out on paper, black and white, detailing elevations and sections of wall bracket mount with measurements and annotation.
fields.title: Industrial Design Drawing: Wall bracket
fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D, case KK, shelf 14
fields.marks:
1 WALL BRACKET, ABD, MOULDED, MATT TEXTURE (BT-X2) / ALL OVER.'
 'NOTES. / ALL VIEWS DRAWN AT NOMINAL SIZE. MANAFACTURER TO DETERMINE / TOLERANCES TO GIVE CLEARANCE WITH BACK OF BASE STATIONS. / BASE SHOULD BE RATTLE FREE WHEN MOUNTED TO THE WALL BRACKET.
 'NOTE: / PRODUCT SPECIFICATION TO INCLUDE / ASSOCIATED WALL MOUNT FIXINGS / SCREWS:- 2 OFF # 8 X 1 INCH SLOTTED / PAN SELFTAPPING AB ZINC / WALL PLUGS:- 2 OFF # 8 X 1 INCH GOOD / QUALITY PLASTIC WALL PLUGS. / BT PRODUCT MANAGEMENT / FOR APPROVAL.'
 isometric diagram of screw with dimension measurements
 'PLINTH COMMON TO ALL VERSIONS / DECT BASE STATIONS'
 'DRG No. / BTM67-009-1  Sheet 1 0f 1 / DATE/MODIFICATIONS   DRAWN   CHEKD / 1. 09/07/97  CRVW. / MANUFACTURING ISSUE. / NOTES: / THIS DRAWING TO BE READ / IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE / DRAWINGS LISTED BELOW: / BTM67- 003-1 / BTM67- 004-1 / BTM67- 005-1 / BTM67- 006-1 (3-D HANDSET) / BTM67- 007-1 (3-D BASE) / BTM67- 008-1 (3-D CHARGER) / DRAWING INFORMATION / RELATING TO UNDERSIDE, / INTERNAL OR HIDDEN DETAIL, / IS FOR FEASIBILITY / DISCUSSIONS ONLY. FINAL / UNDERSIDE, INTERNAL OR / HIDDEN DETAILS ARE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE / MANUFACTURER. / THIS DRAWING IS NOT FOR / RELEASE TO PARTIES OTHER / THAN BT PLC AND THIRD / PARTIES EXPLICITELY / NOMINATED BY BT PLC. / UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED: / 1. EXTERNAL RADII TO BE 0.25mm / 2. INTERNAL RADII TO BE 0.30mm / 3. DRAFT ANGLE TO BE 1 DEG. / 4. GAPS BETWEEN KEYS AND / CABINET TO BE 0.15mm / PER SIDE. / 5. PRODUCTION CLEARANCES / BETWEEN COMPONENTS / TO BE AGREED BY RANDOM / 6. MOULD GATE POSITIONS TO / BE AGREED BY RANDOM / 7. SHARP CORNERS AND WITNESS / MARKS DUE TO TOOL INSERTS / TO BE AGREED BY RANDOM / 8. THE QUALITY OF PRIMARY / SECONDARY AND TERTIARY / SURFACES ARE DEFINED BY / A BRITISH TELECOM QUALITY / DOCUMENT. / THIS DOCUMENT SHOULD BE / REQUESTED DIRECTLY FROM / THE BT PRODUCT MANAGER / CONCERNED. / 9. ALL COLOUR & GRAPHICS ARE / SPECIFIED ON DRAWING / BTM67-002 / PROVISIONAL / DEVELOPMENT INFORMATION ONLY. / THIS DRAWING IS NOT FOR RELEASE TO PARTIES / OTHER THAN BRITISH TELECOM PLC. AND ITS / APPROVED SUPPLIERS. UNAUTHORISED REPRODUCTION / USE OR DISCLOSURE OF ANY MATERIAL CONTAINED / HEREIN IS STRICLY PROHIBITED.'
 'Random / RANDOM STUDIOS, MANOR PARK, ALDERSHOT, HANTS, GU12 4XQ / TEL: 01252 351200 FAX: 01252350330 / © COPYRIGHT RANDOM PRODUCT DESIGN LTD. 1997. / PRODUCED ON HEWLETT-PACKARD ME10.'
 British Telecom logo showing initials and a figure of Mercury.
 'TOLERANCES - UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED / OPEN ± 0,5 / 1 DEC PLACE ± 0,2 / 2 DEC PLACE ±  0,1 / ANGLES ±  0,5°  / A0 / DO NOT SCALE / DIMENSIONS IN MILLLIMETRES  THIRD ANGLE PROJECTION / MATERIAL / SEE NOTES / FINISH / SEE NOTES'
 'CLIENT / BT PLC / PROJECT NAME / NEW DECT DESIGN DRAWING: / WALL BRACKET / DRAWN / AK / DATE / 05/06/97 / SCALE / 1:1 / DRG No. / btm67-009-1  SHEET 1 of 1'
 'DATUM Y / DATUM Z / SECTION X-X / 3.5° TYPICAL A/R / ALL SURFACES IN THIS VIEW / TO BE CONSIDERED PRIMARY / DATUM Z / A / LINE OF DRAW / SIDE PIPS TO /  PREVENT SIDEWAYS / MOVEMENT. TUNE AT OFF TOOL / STAGE TO CORRESPOND WITH / BASE MOULDING. /B / 1 / X / SIDE CLIPS TO / LOCATE INTO BASE / UNDERSIDE RECESS. / MANUFACTURER TO / CHECK TOLERANCE / OF FIT. ANGLED FACE / TO ALLOW ARMS TO / LOCATE IN THE BASE. / RAISED RIBS REST / ON BASE REAR MOULDING / MANAFACTURER TO TUNE TO / MAXIMISE BEST / FIT. / SQUEEZE ARMS TO RELEASE / DATUM Z / Y / Y / A / B /  DATUM X / DATUM Z / SIDE ARM WITH CLIP DETAIL / DATUM Z / SECTION Y-Y / NOTCH SHOWN AS A SUGGESTION ONLY. ABILITY TO TUNE THE / FLEXIBILITY OF ARMS / OF OFF-TOOL MOULDINGS / WILL BE IMPORTANT TO  / MAXIMISE PERFORMANCE / OF BASE TO WALL BRACKET / CLIPPING.'
 'SECTION A-A / DATUM Z / TOP HOOL TO LOCATE /  INTO REAR BASE MOULDING / MANUFACTURER TO CHECK / TOLERANCE OF FIT. / HOOKS TO BE  / CORED THROUGH FROM BACK / DATUM X / SECTION B / DATUM Z / DATUM X'
 'SECTION A-A / DATUM Z'
 'PLINTH COMMON TO ALL VERSIONS / DECT BASE STATIONS'
 'ADDITIONAL VIEWS FOR / INFORMATION ONLY / DO NOT DIMENSION'
